column2: "Afei woyinom nye hɔn a wɔbaa David nkyɛn wɔ Ziklag mber a osian Kish ne ba Saul ntsi osiiw noho do no: nna wɔwɔ mbarimba akatakyi

column3: na wotum dze nsa enyimfa na abankum nyina tow tsiabo do abo
column4: na egyen do egyen menaba; wɔyɛ Saul no nuanom a wofi Benjamin mu."
Gibeatnyi Semaa mba no; na Jeziel
na ɔhwɛ eduasa no do; na Jeremia
na Bealia
na Azarel
Jeroham a ofi Gedor mba no."

column2: "Na Gadfo mu hɔn a wɔtseew hɔnho baa David nkyɛn wɔ sar no do tu no mu no yɛ mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam
column3: mbarimba akofo a wotum suo kyɛm na peaa mu a
column4: hɔn enyim tse dɛ ngyata enyim
column5: na hɔn ho yɛ har dɛ mbepɔw do atwe no nye yi:"

column4: ebiasa Eliab;"

column2: "Gadmba mu woyinom na wɔyɛ dɔm mu asafohemfo: nyia osuar dodow koraa no botum ɔha
"Woyinom nye hɔn a wosii mu kotwaa Jordan wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no mu
column3: aber a nsu no eyir akata no kɔn nyinara do no; na wɔkaa hɔn a wofi abɔn no mu nyinara gui
column4: boka afamu

column2: "Na Benjamin na Judamba mu binom baa David nkyɛn wɔ tu no mu."
"Na David fiir edzi kɔr hɔn enyim
column4: Sɛ hom baa me nkyɛn asomdwee mu dɛ hom robɔboa me a
column5: ɔno m’akoma bɛfam hom ho: na sɛ hom baa dɛ woribeyi me ama m’atamfo
column6: wɔ dɛ mfom bi nnyi me nsamu yi a
column7: ɔnodze hɛn egyanom Nyankopɔn nhwɛ na ɔnka enyim."

column2: "Nna sunsum no baa Amasai a ɔyɛ eduasa no mu otsitsir no do
column4: Yɛyɛ wodze
column9: na asomdwee nka w’aboafo; osiandɛ wo Nyankopɔn roboa wo. Nna David gyee hɔn
column10: na ɔyɛɛ hɔn kuw no do asafohemfo."

column2: "Manaasɛ mu so binom danee kɔr David nkyɛn
column3: aber a nkyɛ ɔnye Filistiafo no reba nye Saul abɔko no; naaso Filistiafo no enntsie no
column4: osiandɛ hɔn asafohemfo no kɔr egyina gyaa no kwan
column6: Hɛn etsir na ɔdze bɛpata akɔ no wura Saul nkyɛn."

column3: Manaasɛ mu binom danee kɔr ne nkyɛn
column4: Adna
column11: na Manaasɛ mu mpem do asafohemfo."

column2: "Na hɔn na wɔboaa David ma ɔnye epoobɔfo dzii esi; osiandɛ hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam
column3: na wɔyɛ dɔm no mu asafohemfo."

column2: "Na daa nyina wɔdze David nkyɛn ba ara
column4: kodur dɛ wɔyɛɛ dɔm kɛse

column2: "Na woyinom nye hɔn mu etsitsir a woemia ama akodzi a wɔbaa David nkyɛn wɔ Hebron
column3: dɛ wɔrebɛdan Saul n’ahendzi no ama no
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm no tse no

column2: "Judamba a wokitsa kyɛm na peaa a woemia ama akodzi wɔyɛ mpemesia ahaawɔtwe."
"Simeonmba mu mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam ma akodzi
"Na Jehoiada na ɔyɛ Aaron fie ɔbapɔmba
column3: na nyimpa mpem ebiasa ahaesuon ka no ho;"

column4: na n’egya fi mu asafohemfo eduonu ebien."
mpem ebiasa na ɔdze bodu mber no nna hɔn mu nyimpadodow ara esie hɔn nokwardzi ama Saul fie."
nyimpa a wɔwɔ dzin wɔ hɔn egyanom efiefi."

column3: mpemduawɔtwe a wɔbɔɔ hɔn dzin dɛ wɔmbra mbɛhyɛ David hen."
nyimpa a wɔwɔ mber mu nhumu
